result.query:
Please find the name of the catalyst and co-catalyst name from the provided context which describe an solar chemical experiment.
Please only generate the name of the catalyst and nothing else. Such as TiO2. ZrO2 or Ag, etc.
Please generating restrictively follow the format, and must start the generation as the format. Do not generate anything else.
If there are multiple results, please indicate them as XXX-XXX.
catalyst: XXX
co_catalyst: XXX

evidence.pdf_reference: Developing integrated photocatalysts with advanced structures and desired components is an effective strategy for promoting solar-to-chemical energy conversion.Herein, a novel sulfur-doped In 2 O 3 -CeO 2 hollow hexagonal prism with a thin carbon coating (S-CIn 2 O 3 -CeO 2 HHP) is synthesized by directly pyrolyzing Ce-doped In-Materials of Institute Lavoisier-68 (In-MIL-68) hexagonal prism metal-organic frameworks under N 2 atmosphere in the presence of sulfur powder, showing excellent photocatalytic

and photoreduction.These significant factors contribute to the enhancement of photocatalytic performance and selectivity of CO 2 photoreduction over S-CIn 2 O 3 -CeO 2 HHP 58596061.As far as we know, these CO 2 photoreduction results exceed most of the reported photocatalysts without nobel metal cocatalysts and sacrificial reagent under similar gas-solid reaction models (Table S4).Notably, the S-CIn 2 O 3 -CeO 2 HHP shows durable activity for photocatalytic CO 2 reduction (Fig. 5d).The SEM image and XRD

(Fig. 5d).The SEM image and XRD pattern of the S-CIn 2 O 3 -CeO 2 HHP after four cycles of CO 2 photoreduction testing demonstrate its intact morphology and structure stability (Fig. S10). To verify CH 4 and CO gas product come from CO 2 conversion over S-CIn 2 O 3 -CeO 2 HHP catalyst, several controlled experiments were conducted (Fig. 5e).No CH 4 and CO were detected without photocatalyst or under dark, further confirming that the CH 4 and CO generation was indeed driven by photocatalyst under light

by photocatalyst under light irradiation.When N 2 gas was used to replace CO 2 gas, no CH 4 and CO were detected under identical reaction conditions.Moreover, the physical mixture of S-C In surface defects in CIn 2 O 3 -CeO 2 act as photogenerated electron-hole recombination centers to increase the recombination chance of electrons and holes, resulting in an increased PL intensity compared with S-CIn 2 O 3 -CeO 2 HHP.Meanwhile, the strongest fluorescence quenching was observed for S-CIn 2 O 3 -CeO 2 HHP

S-CIn 2 O 3 -CeO 2 HHP.Thus the enhanced photocatalytic performance towards CO 2 reduction reaction is expected.A gas-solid model was used in CO photoreduction reactions under ambient pressure.No photosensitizers and sacrificial reagents were introduced in the reaction system.Fig. 5a andb show the time-yield plots of CH 4 and CO generated from different catalysts under AM1.5 irradiation, respectively.The average evolution rates of CH 4 and CO were shown in Fig. 5c.In 2 O 3 HHP produced CO and CH 4 with a

Please find the category of Light_source and Lamp from the provided context which describe an solar chemical experiment.
The generation condition of the extraction is given: If Light_source is Solar or Solar Simulator, Lamp is always Solar Simulator.
Please only select the generation from the provided possible choices.
Possible Choices:
Light_source: ['UV', 'Solar', 'UV-Vis', 'Monochromatic', 'Solar Simulator']
Lamp: ['Fluorescent', 'Mercury', 'Halogen', 'Mercury-Xenon', 'LED', 'Tungsten', 'Xenon', 'Tungsten-Halide', 'Solar Simulator']
Please generating restrictively follow the format, and must start the generation as the format. Do not generate anything else.
Light_source: XXX
Lamp: XXX

a 300 W Xe lamp with an AM 1.5 filter.Saturated calomel electrode and Platinum wire were used as the reference electrode and counter electrode, respectively. S-CIn 2 O 3 -CeO 2 HHP.Thus the enhanced photocatalytic performance towards CO 2 reduction reaction is expected.A gas-solid model was used in CO photoreduction reactions under ambient pressure.No photosensitizers and sacrificial reagents were introduced in the reaction system.Fig. 5a andb show the time-yield plots of CH 4 and CO generated from different catalysts under AM1.5 irradiation, respectively.The average evolution rates of CH 4 and CO were shown in Fig. 5c.In 2 O 3 HHP produced CO and CH 4 with a

average yield of O 2 is 130.6 mol g -1 h -1 , which is close to the theoretical evolution rate of O 2 according to the redox reaction mechanism.The results confirm that the electrons for the CO 2 reduction come from the oxidation of water. The remarkable CO 2 reduction performance of S-CIn 2 O 3 -CeO 2 HHP might be related to the well-defined hollow hexagonal prism-shaped composite features with some favorable properties.First, hollow porous hexagonal prism architecture with a large surface area offers
